text: Darryl Sutton (27 July 1952 - 28 January 2017) was an Australian rules footballer. He played for North Melbourne, Richmond and the Sydney Swans in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He was born in Tasmania. Sutton had dementia. He died from pneumonia on 28 January 2017 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Australia Category:Sportspeople from Hobart
title: Darryl Sutton
